casebody.data:
DTH MEDIA CORPORATION, et al.
v.
FOLT, et al. 142PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 5, 2018 Hugh Stevens, Attorney at Law, Michael J. Tadych, Attorney at Law, for DTH Media Corporation, et al. Stephanie A. Brennan, Special Deputy Attorney General, for Folt, Carol L., et al.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 2nd of November 2018 by Defendants:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of November 2018."

Defendants shall have up to and including the 27th day of December 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
